# Getting started
  
## Installing packages

If you have installed the below packages already, you can jump to the next step.
```{r}
#install.packages("data.table")
#install.packages("dplyr")
#install.packages("RPostgreSQL")
```


## Loading packages
Load the packages for today's talk  
```{r}

library(data.table)
#library(dtplyr)
library(sqldf)
library(RPostgreSQL)
library(dplyr)

```

## Install PostGIS and Alteryx software
### Install PostGIS
(1) Step 1: download the PostgreSQL
<center>

![](pic/post1.png)
</center>


(2) Step 2: select the right version for your system
<center>

![](pic/post2.png)
</center>
(3) Step 3: download the installer
<center>

![](pic/post3.png)
</center>
(4) Step 4: download the software
<center>

![](pic/post4.png)
</center>
(5) Step 5: install the PostgreSQL
<center>

![](pic/post5.png)
</center>
(6) Step 6: set the password
<center>

![](pic/post6.png)
</center>
(7) Step 7: select the port number
<center>

![](pic/post7.png)
</center>
(8) Step 8: click the Stack Builder
<center>

![](pic/post8.png)
</center>
(9) Step 9: choose the PostgreSQL for additional installation
<center>

![](pic/post9.png)
</center>
(10) Step 10: install the spatial extension
<center>

![](pic/post10.png)
</center>
(10) Step 10: create a postGIS database
<center>

![](pic/post11.png)
</center>

(12) Step 12: Enter the password
<center>

![](pic/post12.png)
</center>

(13) Step 13: set the database name
<center>

![](pic/post13.png)
</center>
(14) Step 14: Finish
<center>

![](pic/post14.png)
</center>

You will find a PostGIS database names as casa in your postgreSQL
<center>

![](pic/post15.png)
</center>
**Note:** you can firstly create a database in PostgreSQL and then extent it to PostGIS database([Enabling PostGIS](https://postgis.net/install/))
<center>

![](pic/postold.png)
</center>



### Install Alteryx
For academics, students, nonprofits institutes, you can install the Alteryx for free through [Alteryx for Good](https://www.alteryx.com/why-alteryx/alteryx-for-good).

(1) Step 1: Apply the Alteryx For Good License
<center>

![](pic/alter1.png)
</center>

(2) Step 2: Click the Alteryx Designer in Product Downloads

<center>

![](pic/alter2.png)
</center>

(3) Step 3: click the Alteryx Designer (2021.1)

<center>

![](pic/alter3.png)
</center>


(4) Step 4: download the Alteryx Designer and Alteryx Predictive Tools

<center>

![](pic/alter4.png)
</center>
